AutoActor.InitCommand: %function(self) if CharacterValue == 1 then self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) self:draworder(9) self:zoom(0.8) self:diffusealpha(0) self:sleep(10.6) self:decelerate(1) self:diffusealpha(1) self:fadebottom(0.3) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+90) self:sleep(5.5) self:accelerate(1) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) else self:hidden(1) end end

%function(self) if CharacterValue == 2 then self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) self:draworder(9) self:zoom(0.8) self:diffusealpha(0) self:sleep(10.6) self:decelerate(1) self:diffusealpha(1) self:fadebottom(0.3) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+90) self:sleep(5.5) self:accelerate(1) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) else self:hidden(1) end end

%function(self) if CharacterValue == 3 then self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) self:draworder(9) self:zoom(0.5) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,10,0) self:diffusealpha(0) self:sleep(10.6) self:decelerate(1) self:diffusealpha(1) self:fadebottom(0.3) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+90) self:sleep(5.5) self:accelerate(1) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) else self:hidden(1) end end

%function(self) if CharacterValue == 4 then self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) self:draworder(9) self:zoom(0.3) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,10,0) self:diffusealpha(0) self:sleep(10.6) self:decelerate(1) self:diffusealpha(1) self:fadebottom(0.3) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+130) self:sleep(5.5) self:accelerate(1) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) else self:hidden(1) end end

%function(self) if CharacterValue == 5 then self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) self:draworder(9) self:zoom(0.3) self:fadeleft(0.1) self:faderight(0.1) self:diffusealpha(0) self:sleep(10.6) self:decelerate(1) self:diffusealpha(1) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+130) self:sleep(5.5) self:accelerate(1) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) else self:hidden(1) end end

%function(self) if CharacterValue == 6 then self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) self:draworder(9) self:zoom(2) self:diffusealpha(0) self:sleep(10.6) self:decelerate(1) self:diffusealpha(1) self:fadebottom(0.3) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+130) self:sleep(5.5) self:accelerate(1) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) else self:hidden(1) end end

%function(self) if CharacterValue == 7 then self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) self:draworder(9) self:zoom(0.5) self:diffusealpha(0) self:sleep(10.6) self:decelerate(1) self:diffusealpha(1) self:fadebottom(0.3) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+130) self:sleep(5.5) self:accelerate(1) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) else self:hidden(1) end end

%function(self) if CharacterValue == 8 then self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) self:draworder(9) self:zoom(0.5) self:diffusealpha(0) self:sleep(10.6) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,10,0) self:decelerate(1) self:diffusealpha(1) self:fadebottom(0.3) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+190) self:sleep(5.5) self:accelerate(1) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) else self:hidden(1) end end

%function(self) if CharacterValue == 9 then self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) self:draworder(9) self:zoom(0.2) self:diffusealpha(0) self:sleep(10.6) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,10,0) self:decelerate(1) self:diffusealpha(1) self:fadebottom(0.3) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+190) self:sleep(5.5) self:accelerate(1) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) else self:hidden(1) end end
